onCreateCommand: rm -rf web && git clone https://github.com/pi-base/web.git && cd web && pnpm install && pnpm run --filter core build

postAttachCommand.viewer: cd web && pnpm run --filter viewer dev --host --open
postAttachCommand.compile: cd web && pnpm run --filter compile dev
postAttachCommand.core: cd web && pnpm run --filter core dev
